tool_description: Extremely Comprehensive Local Business / Place Data from Google Maps - Reviews, Photos, Emails, Social, and 30+ additional data points with the most comprehensive and maintained local business API on the market.
name: Local Business Data
title: Local Business Data

api_list.name: Autocomplete
api_list.description: Returns place/address, business and query predictions for text-based geographic queries.

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description:
Set the language of the results. For a list of supported language codes see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2 .
Default: `en`

optional_parameters.name: region
optional_parameters.description:
Return results biased to a particular region. For a list of supported region/country codes see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes (Alpha-2 code).
Default: `us`

optional_parameters.name: coordinates
optional_parameters.description: Geographic coordinates of the location from which the query is applied - recommended to use so that results are biased towards this location. Defaults to some central location in the region (see the `region` parameter).

api_list.name: Business Reviews
api_list.description: Get all / paginate business reviews by Business Id.

required_parameters.name: business_id
required_parameters.description: Unique Business Id. Accepts google_id / business_id and google_place_id. Examples of valid ids: `0x880fd393d427a591:0x8cba02d713a995ed`, `ChIJkaUn1JPTD4gR7ZWpE9cCuow`.

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description:
Set the language of the results. For a list of supported language codes see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes .

**Default**: *`en`*

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description:
Maximum number of business reviews to return (1-1000).

**Default**: *`20`*

optional_parameters.name: query
optional_parameters.description: Return reviews matching a text query.

optional_parameters.name: region
optional_parameters.description:
Query Google Maps from a particular region or country. For a list of supported region/country codes see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes (Alpha-2 code).

**Default:** *`us`*

optional_parameters.name: fields
optional_parameters.description:
A comma separated list of review fields to include in the response (field projection). By default all fields are returned.

**e.g.** `review_id,review_text,rating`

optional_parameters.name: sort_by
optional_parameters.description:
How to sort the reviews in the results.

**Allowed values**: *`most_relevant, newest, highest_ranking, lowest_ranking`*.

**Default**: *`most_relevant`*

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description:
Number of business reviews to skip (for pagination/scrolling).

**Default**: *`0`*

api_list.name: Search Nearby
api_list.description: Search businesses near by specific geographic coordinates. To see it in action, right click on a specific point in the map on Google Maps and select "Search nearby", enter a query and search.

required_parameters.name: lng
required_parameters.description: Longitude of the geographic coordinates to search near by.

required_parameters.name: lat
required_parameters.description: Latitude of the geographic coordinates to search near by.

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description:
Set the language of the results. For a list of supported language codes see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes .

**Default**: *`en`*

optional_parameters.name: subtypes
optional_parameters.description:
Find businesses with specific subtypes, specified as a comma separated list of types (business categories). For the complete list of types, see https://daltonluka.com/blog/google-my-business-categories.

**e.g.** `Plumber,Carpenter,Electrician`
**e.g.** `Night club,Dance club,Bar,Pub`

optional_parameters.name: fields
optional_parameters.description:
A comma separated list of business fields to include in the response (field projection). By default all fields are returned.

**e.g.** `business_id,type,phone_number,full_address`

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description:
Maximum number of businesses to return (1-500).

**Default**: *`20`*

optional_parameters.name: region
optional_parameters.description:
Query Google Maps from a particular region or country. For a list of supported region/country codes see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes (Alpha-2 code).

**Default:** *`us`*

api_list.name: Business Details
api_list.description: Get full business details including emails and social contacts. Supports batching of up to 20 Business Ids.

required_parameters.name: business_id
required_parameters.description:
Unique Business Id. Accepts google_id / business_id and google_place_id. Examples of valid ids: `0x880fd393d427a591:0x8cba02d713a995ed`, `ChIJkaUn1JPTD4gR7ZWpE9cCuow`.

In addition, batching of up to 20 Business Ids is supported in a single request using a comma separated list (e.g. business_id=id1,id2).

optional_parameters.name: extract_share_link
optional_parameters.description:
Whether to extract place's share link for the business. In case true, businesses will be enriched with a `share_link` field containing a shortened Google URL for sharing (e.g. https://goo.gl/maps/oxndE8SVaNU5CV6p6).

**Default**: *`false`*

optional_parameters.name: experimental
optional_parameters.description: Experimental flag

optional_parameters.name: region
optional_parameters.description:
Query Google Maps from a particular region or country. For a list of supported region/country codes see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes (Alpha-2 code).

**Default:** *`us`*

optional_parameters.name: extract_emails_and_contacts
optional_parameters.description:
Whether to extract emails, contacts and social profiles for the business. In case true, businesses will be enriched with a `emails_and_contacts` field, potentially containing emails, phones, Facebook, LinkedIn, Instagram and other social profiles.

**Default**: *`true`*

optional_parameters.name: fields
optional_parameters.description:
A comma separated list of business fields to include in the response (field projection). By default all fields are returned.

**e.g.** `business_id,type,phone_number,full_address`

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description:
Set the language of the results. For a list of supported language codes see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes .

**Default**: *`en`*

optional_parameters.name: coordinates
optional_parameters.description: Geographic coordinates of the location from which the query is applied - recommended to use so that results are biased towards this location. Defaults to some central location in the region (see the `region` parameter).

data.name: Dunn Heat Exchangers, Inc.
data.full_address: Dunn Heat Exchangers, Inc., 410 21st St S, Texas City, TX 77590

reviews_sample.review_text:
Went to meet the Dunn team and they were amazing.
Great company and great people.
10 stars.

Their products are great. But their customer service and truthfulness is horrible. I've been burned by them and don't want anyone else to experience this. Go to their competition. You'll be glad you did.
I just deliver here.  Have had great relationship with the crew; don't really know the business.

api_list.name: Search In Area
api_list.description: Search businesses in a specific geographic area defined by a center coordinate point and zoom level. To see it in action, make a query on Google Maps, wait for the results to show, move the map or change the zoom and click "Search this area" at the top.

required_parameters.name: lat
required_parameters.description: Latitude of the center coordinate point of the area to search in.

required_parameters.name: zoom
required_parameters.description: Zoom level on which to make the search (the search area / viewport is determined by lat, lng and zoom on a 1000x1000 screen).

required_parameters.name: lng
required_parameters.description: Longitude of the center coordinate point of the area to search in.

optional_parameters.name: region
optional_parameters.description:
Query Google Maps from a particular region or country. For a list of supported region/country codes see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes (Alpha-2 code).

**Default:** *`us`*

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description:
Set the language of the results. For a list of supported language codes see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes .

**Default**: *`en`*

optional_parameters.name: subtypes
optional_parameters.description:
Find businesses with specific subtypes, specified as a comma separated list of types (business categories). For the complete list of types, see https://daltonluka.com/blog/google-my-business-categories.

**e.g.** `Plumber,Carpenter,Electrician`
**e.g.** `Night club,Dance club,Bar,Pub`

optional_parameters.name: fields
optional_parameters.description:
A comma separated list of business fields to include in the response (field projection). By default all fields are returned.

**e.g.** `business_id,type,phone_number,full_address`

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description:
Maximum number of businesses to return (1-500).

**Default**: *`20`*

api_list.name: Business Photo Details
api_list.description: Get extra details about a business photo - caption, owner name and avatar, and more information. Supports batching of up to 20 Photo Ids.

required_parameters.name: photo_id
required_parameters.description:
Unique Photo Id.

In addition, batching of up to 20 Photo Ids is supported in a single request using a comma separated list (e.g. photo_id=id1,id2).

required_parameters.name: business_id
required_parameters.description: The Business Id of the business for which the photo belongs. Accepts google_id / business_id and google_place_id. Examples of valid ids: `0x880fd393d427a591:0x8cba02d713a995ed`, `ChIJkaUn1JPTD4gR7ZWpE9cCuow`.

api_list.name: Business Photos
api_list.description: Get business photos by Business Id.

required_parameters.name: business_id
required_parameters.description: Unique Business Id. Accepts google_id / business_id and google_place_id. Examples of valid ids: `0x880fd393d427a591:0x8cba02d713a995ed`, `ChIJkaUn1JPTD4gR7ZWpE9cCuow`.

optional_parameters.name: cursor
optional_parameters.description: Specify the cursor obtained from the previous request to get the next of result page (use for pagination).

optional_parameters.name: fields
optional_parameters.description:
A comma separated list of review fields to include in the response (field projection). By default all fields are returned.

**e.g.** `type,photo_url`

optional_parameters.name: region
optional_parameters.description:
Query Google Maps from a particular region or country. For a list of supported region/country codes see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes (Alpha-2 code).

**Default:** *`us`*

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description:
Maximum number of business photos to return (1-100).

**Default**: *`20`*

api_list.name: Search
api_list.description: Search local businesses on Google Maps.

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description:
Search query / keyword.

**e.g.** `Plumbers near New-York, USA`
**e.g.** `Bars in 94102, USA`

optional_parameters.name: region
optional_parameters.description:
Query Google Maps from a particular region or country. For a list of supported region/country codes see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes (Alpha-2 code).

**Default:** *`us`*

optional_parameters.name: business_status
optional_parameters.description:
Find businesses with specific status, specified as a comma separated list of the following values: `OPEN`, `CLOSED_TEMPORARILY`, `CLOSED`.

**e.g.** `OPEN`
**e.g.** `CLOSED_TEMPORARILY,CLOSED`

optional_parameters.name: subtypes
optional_parameters.description:
Find businesses with specific subtypes, specified as a comma separated list of types (business categories). For the complete list of types, see https://daltonluka.com/blog/google-my-business-categories.

**e.g.** `Plumber,Carpenter,Electrician`
**e.g.** `Night club,Dance club,Bar,Pub`

optional_parameters.name: verified
optional_parameters.description: Only return verified businesses

optional_parameters.name: lat
optional_parameters.description: Latitude of the coordinates point from which the query is applied - recommended to use so that results are biased towards this location. Defaults to some central location in the region (see the `region` parameter).

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description:
Maximum number of businesses to return (1-500).

**Default**: *`20`*

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description:
Set the language of the results. For a list of supported language codes see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes .

**Default**: *`en`*

optional_parameters.name: zoom
optional_parameters.description:
Zoom level on which to make the search (the viewport is determined by lat, lng and zoom).

**Default**: *`13`*

optional_parameters.name: fields
optional_parameters.description:
A comma separated list of business fields to include in the response (field projection). By default all fields are returned.

**e.g.** `business_id,type,phone_number,full_address`

optional_parameters.name: lng
optional_parameters.description: Longitude of the coordinates point from which the query is applied - recommended to use so that results are biased towards this location. Defaults to some central location in the region (see the `region` parameter).

api_list.name: Business Posts
api_list.description: Get all / paginate Business Owner Posts ("From the owner" section on Google Maps) by Business Id, sorted chronologically.

required_parameters.name: business_id
required_parameters.description: Unique Business Id. Accepts google_id / business_id and google_place_id. Examples of valid ids: `0x880fd393d427a591:0x8cba02d713a995ed`, `ChIJkaUn1JPTD4gR7ZWpE9cCuow`.

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description:
Set the language of the results. For a list of supported language codes see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes .

**Default**: *`en`*

optional_parameters.name: region
optional_parameters.description:
Query Google Maps from a particular region or country. For a list of supported region/country codes see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes (Alpha-2 code).

**Default:** *`us`*

optional_parameters.name: cursor
optional_parameters.description: Specify the cursor obtained from the previous request to get the next of result page (use for pagination).
